sentences.en: A grassy quadrangle surrounded by cloisters.
sentences.cn: 庭院一种长有草的四方小院.

sentences.en: Block, north to south, for the quadrangle layout, an area of 1612 square meters.
sentences.cn: 座北向南, 平面布局为四合院, 占地1612平方米.

sentences.en: He left the old quadrangle, and went to food market straightly.
sentences.cn: 他离开老四合院, 并继续对粮食市场的直线.

sentences.en: I almost had spent my childhood at my grandmother's quadrangle in countryside.
sentences.cn: 我的童年多半是在乡下奶奶家的四合院度过的.

sentences.en: Naturally our whole being was depressed as we stepped through its doorway into the narrow quadrangle--and playing truant became chronic with us.
sentences.cn: 很自然，当我们踏进校门进入那狭小的四方院子时，我们整个人都变得萎靡不振---逃学就成为我们的家常便饭。

sentences.en: Properly combined with other graphic elements, background, and color palette, quadrangle logos may become efficient identifications for businessand impressive addition to a logo designer’s portfolio.
sentences.cn: 适当结合其他图形元素、背景和配色，四边形logo或可成为高效的商业标识，亦可为logo设计师的作品集里添上印象深刻的一笔。

sentences.en: Shouts from the open window startling evening in the quadrangle.
sentences.cn: 从敞开着的窗户传出的喧嚷声,惊动了方院的暮色.

sentences.en: Six lines of building base of quadrangle was discovered in Yin Ruins.
sentences.cn: 对殷墟某一区域建筑基址的大面积揭露,在殷墟考古上是极为难得的.

sentences.en: Such quadrangle-shaped logos may fit all kinds of projects: from hotel logos to social initiatives and to real estate agencies.
sentences.cn: 这样的四边形logo可适用于各类项目：从旅馆logo到社会创意，再到房地产商。

sentences.en: The architectural form of Beijing quadrangle is deeply influenced by Confucianism.
sentences.cn: 北京四合院的建筑形式的形成深受儒家哲学思想的影响.

sentences.en: The fine, intelligent, educated voice sang on in the sunny quadrangle of red - brick Colonial buildings.
sentences.cn: 那美妙, 聪明, 受过教育的声音回响在充满阳光的,殖民时期的红砖房子围成的庭院中.

sentences.en: This alleyway - quadrangle complex is the true fragment of Yuan Dadu city structure in chessboard shape.
sentences.cn: 这种整体肌理的胡同 - 四合院形态,是元大都棋盘式城市格局的真实片段.

sentences.en: We walked all over the campus from the quadrangle to the athletic grounds.
sentences.cn: 我们从方庭到操场,走遍了整个校园.

trans.tran_cn: 四边形，（尤指大学的学院等的）四方院子
trans.tran_en: a square open area with buildings all around it, especially at a school or college
